name: Rmad
greetingText: I think your name is amazing btw !
wishText: I hope you forgive me and dont hate me and we be friends forever :)
text1: This is a little something for you! :D
textInChatBox: Hii Rmad, I know I kinda upset you a lot in the past few days, and I also know that there is nothing that I could do to change the past. But I want to make the present better so I am writing you this apology. I am really sorry and I hope you could forgive me. You will always be my favorite man in the whole world and I will like you the same forever. OKIII BYEEEE❤️❤️
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again since you loved it so much.
